body.name: Honey-Can-Do SHO-01599 Bamboo 3-Tier Shoe Shelf
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 53 mins
features: Holds up to 12 pairs of grownup shoes
Dimensions: 13'' L x 30” W x 20” H
body.description: Product Description Honey-Can-Do SHO-01599 Deluxe Bamboo Shoe Shelf, 3-Tier. 3-tier shelf for shoes; approximately 3 feet wide; less than 2 feet high. Made from fast-growing bamboo for reduced environmental impact. Slatted surface is attractive, durable, and naturally moisture resistant. Holds approximately 9 to 12 pairs of adult-size shoes. Wipes clean; easy to assemble; available in 2-tier and 3-tier models. From the Manufacturer Honey-Can-Do SHO-01599 3-tier Bamboo Shoe Shelf is designed to help organize shoes and accessories in a small space. Typically in the closet, or near a front door, you can fit multiple pairs of shoes. We found bamboo to very valuable because of its stability. Kids and dogs alike are also safe around this wood shelf because its designed to be snagless. Its a little less that 3 feet wide and less that 2 feet tall

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Bamboo grows quickly, making it one of the most sustainable materials on earth. It’s also naturally moisture-resistant, making it sturdy enough to withstand many winters of dripping boots. But you don’t have to use this just for shoes. It’s at the perfect height to organize kids’ belongings, such as backpacks and bins. Assign a shelf to each family member, and you’ll know exactly whose items are out of place. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, functional, lightweight
reviews.reviewText: Nothing terribly fancy. It does the job and looks reasonably nice. Easy to assemble (pay attention to the images on the box) and stackable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, sturdy enough for my needs, straightforward assembly
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with the shelf. It's intended as a shoe rack, but I'm using it for extra clothes that don't fit in the over-full dresser.Assembly was straightforward and it is reasonably attractive.It's sturdy enough and the size is perfect for the space it needed to fill.No complaints, worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shoe racks
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these shoe racks. They are nice looking, sturdy and easy to assemble. However, one of them was missing two screws. I did receive an extra Allen wrench though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worth it for the price it’s cute not sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and attractive.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase of this shoe rack. Solid wood, easy to assemble. We have one in the garage for my husband's shoes, owned about 1 year. The new one is for my son's tennis shoes...holds 9 pair, size 14. Great product, no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Darn good looking!
reviews.reviewText: The first one I ordered was slightly damaged with the top layers of bamboo coming apart. So glad I ordered a replacement. The new one was in great condition. Easy to put together, and plenty of space on each rack for 3 pairs of shoes. And dare I say, every time I glance at it by my entryway, I can't help but think it's just a really beautiful piece. Highly recommend. Worth the price, especially if your shoe rack is going to be in a spot that's often in your field of vision at home and not tucked away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EVEN A GIRL CAN PUT THIS TOGETHER!
reviews.reviewText: I'm so glad I ordered this bamboo rack! After reading all the negative comments about cheaper shoe racks easily falling apart, I went for the extra ten bucks and chose the Honey-Can-Do, and skipped all those regrets. It was just delivered about an hour ago and I've already got it standing in my closet, loaded with shoes. Easy-peasy! It's adorable! And clean-looking, accurately fabricated (holes are in the right places, all the screws included, no splinters), and sturdy. After I read the instructions a few times, and realized there are alternative ways to put this together, I made my decision and easily assembled it with the Allen wrench enclosed in the box. Despite the title of my review, I'm not a girl ... I am an 80 year old woman, with arthritis and strong determination. I would buy this one again in a heartbeat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good but some things to be aware of
reviews.reviewText: First, yes this is made from bamboo but it is not very strong. Unlike Bamboo flooring this is not that strong (but its not suppose to be).Instructions are missing some pieces like which direction to point the dongles to stack multiple of these together.The dongle for stacking is GLUED IN which is nutz because what if you do not want to stack. It looks awful with this sticking at the top and strange if it is standing on it.If you have it on a non-carpet floor it will slide all over the place. Use a anti slide rubber sticky on it (solves the problem).Honestly, I love the rack! It looks nice and does the job. Just be aware of the things I pointed out and you will not have any issues.
